detail_desc: Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
Shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué on the front.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Low waist with wide elastication, and a high cut at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in a soft, organic cotton dobby weave with frilled shoulder straps that cross at the back. Elastication and frills at the top, concealed press-studs at the crotch and elasticated hems. Sizes 1-4Y with no press-studs at the crotch and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit decorated at the front with shimmering plastic beads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.

iPhone case in imitation leather with a detachable strap made from metal chain and imitation leather. Three card compartments on one side and a metal decoration on the other. Can be worn as a necklace or over one shoulder.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with covered block heels and chisel toes. Visible seams front and back, a concealed zip on the inside and a loop at the back. Linings in jersey made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 6.5 cm.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut back. Three pairs of narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. A-line, sleeveless dress in soft, patterned slub jersey made from organic cotton. Narrow shoulder straps and gathered seams front and back.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hood and zipped, stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with buttons down the front, chest pockets, side pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Thin tights with a spotted pattern and an elasticated waist.
Loose-fitting, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication at the top. Short sleeves with an opening and ties, and a rounded hem.
Loose-fitting top in a lustrous Tencel™ lyocell-blend weave in a V-cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in soft cotton. Funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a cupro and viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tie detail at one side, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, block-patterned jumper in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fisherman’s hat in UV-protective material with ties under the chin. Width of brim 5.5 cm. UPF 50.
Sleeveless, flared V-neck top in woven fabric with a rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Oversized T-shirt in soft jersey with a ribbed neckline and low dropped shoulders.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated waist.

Fully lined bikini top in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck and practical zip at the front that is closed by pulling the tab upwards. Removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, a racer back and a wide trim at the hem in elastic with a sheen.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined velvet with a stand-up collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves. Jersey lining.
Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Smocked seam at the waist and a skirt with different lengths of tiered flounces. Lined.
Maxi dress in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover front and narrow ties at the waist that fasten on one side. Lined.

Small bag decoration in the shape of a backpack that has shoulder straps, a zip at the top with a decorative pompom, and a zipped outer compartment. Metal chain with a ring and carabiner hook. Height 9 cm. Width 7 cm. Depth 3 cm.
Trousers in a soft cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, and side pockets.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Shopper in woven fabric with two handles and a zip at the top and a zipped inner pocket. Lined. Size 13x41x57 cm.
Plastic hair claws. Width 3.5 cm.
Airy blouse in a crinkled weave with a small frilled collar and long sleeves with a frill at the cuffs. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and overlocked edges.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap, metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 11 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print and terry motif, a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Waist bag in woven fabric with an embroidered text motif. One large compartment with a concealed zip at the front and one zipped compartment at the back. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth approx. 5 cm. Height approx. 16 cm. Width approx. 28 cm.

Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and a small welt coin pocket at the front. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs with slim-fit hems.
Derby shoes in imitation patent leather with open lacing and pointed toes. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Round, plastic and metal earrings in two different designs. Length approx. 3 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Short, straight T-shirt dress in soft printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.

Top in a textured weave made from a viscose blend with a square neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and adjustable buttoning, and a seam at the hem with a gently flared peplum. Partly lined.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist, a pleated skirt and laser-cut hem. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a velvety finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front with a chin guard, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets at the top, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Dress in lightweight, patterned twill with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Classic T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and print motif on the front.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Hooded jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a contrasting colour button placket and a kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and patch leg pockets with a flap, concealed press-studs and pleats for extra space.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and slim, calf-length legs with a slit at the hems.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly and buttons. Front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Long shirt jacket in a wool blend with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and flap chest and front pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fully lined swimsuit with a decorative zip at the top and round neck front and back.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative, overlocked seams, a seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Derby shoes in patent leather with open lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and fluted soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short wrap dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and a seam at the waist with a tie belt. Frill-trimmed edge and hem on the skirt. Unlined.
